defaultPaths.description:
The default paths of the signature pad.
Use when you don't need to control the paths of the signature pad.

disabled.description: Whether the signature pad is disabled.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; control: string; hiddenInput: string; label: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the signature pad elements. Useful for composition.

name.description: The name of the signature pad. Useful for form submission.

onDraw.description: Callback when the signature pad is drawing.

onDrawEnd.description: Callback when the signature pad is done drawing.

paths.description: The controlled paths of the signature pad.

readOnly.description: Whether the signature pad is read-only.

required.description: Whether the signature pad is required.

translations.description: The translations of the signature pad. Useful for internationalization.
